Type.Name: ChildExitedHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ChildExitedHandler(object o, ChildExitedArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the ChildExitedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the ChildExitedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the ChildExitedHandler is removed from the event.
